summary.Title: Finance Manager
summary.Presentation: Would you like to join a technology company that will take lead in the development of the next generation of food production?  Seasony offers a robotics automation platform, that can optimi

JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Would you like to join a technology company that will take lead in the development of the next generation of food production?  Seasony offers a robotics automation platform, that can optimize logistics and data monitoring for vertical farms globally.  

 

Finance Manager 

Do you want to build out a team and take charge on the important financial decisions in a fast growing company?  

At Seasony, you'll be managing our financial overview and planning, create and update cash flow budgets, manage invoicing & bookkeeping, and working closely with our auditing firm, on everything from quarterly reporting to annual statements.  

You will be part of a dynamic and ambitious team with great opportunities - and you can be part of defining the future of this exciting journey. You will assume a central position in the team from day one, and we trust that you will drive and manage tasks to deliver great results - of course with strong support from the team.  

 

Your role    

  • Responsibility for accounting in DK and future markets 

  • Audit and tax filings and VAT compliance 

  • Take part in VC fundraising activities and help build the financial backbone of our Robotics-as-a-Service model. 

  • Contact point for bank and auditors 

  • Finance performance meetings with operation managers and management 

  • Contract reviews and ad hoc risk assessments 

  • Reporting directly to our CEO and managing all the financials 

  • Assist in payroll processing    

 

 We imagine that you tick the following boxes:     

  • Have 3-5 years' experience (maybe you are Controller / Auditor wanting to take on the first managing role or you are already a Finance Manager) 

  • High degree of proactivity     

  • Have a strong financial education 

  • Are a strong communicator 

  • Read and write both English and Danish 

  • Have experience with Salary & Dinero (not necessary, but a plus) 

  

We offer:   

  • An attractive job in an agile team   

  • A workplace in an innovation hub in Copenhagen.    

  • You will have responsibilities from day one and a big impact on how the business is developed.   

  • A flexible workplace with a young team.
